quests.desc: You are now playing a exciting session of TextWorld! Your first objective is to make an attempt to go west. After that, go to the south. With that done, head west. Then, make an effort to travel north. And then, make an effort to go to the north. Once you manage that, attempt to venture east. Then, take a trip east. If you can succeed at that, make an effort to head east. Then, attempt to head south. With that over with, close the cabinet within the restroom. Got that? Good!

infos.name: restroom
infos.desc:
You arrive in a restroom. A normal one. Let's see what's in here.

 You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a cabinet.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] What a letdown! The cabinet is empty![end if] You make out [if c_1 is locked]a locked[else if c_1 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] ordinary looking type 0 safe in the room.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The type 0 safe contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: lounge
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a lounge. An usual one. You begin looking for stuff.

 You see a rectangular safe.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The rectangular safe contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The rectangular safe is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading south. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: steam room
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a steam room. A normal kind of place.

 Were you looking for a table? Because look over there, it's a table. [if there is something on the s_0]You see [a list of things on the s_0] on the table.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]The table appears to be empty. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the table.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a cubicle.

 You see a chest.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_3]. There's something strange about this thing being here, but you don't have time to worry about that now.[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The chest is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: pantry
infos.desc:
You arrive in a pantry. A standard one.



You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: recreation zone
infos.desc:
You are in a recreation zone. A typical one. Let's see what's in here.

 Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a bookshelf. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best? The bookshelf is usual.[if there is something on the s_1] On the bookshelf you see [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] But there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a chamber. A standard one.



You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a bedroom. An ordinary kind of place. The room is well lit.

 You scan the room, seeing a suitcase. Is this it? Is this what you came to TextWorld to see? a suitcase?[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The suitcase contains [a list of things in the c_4], so there's that.[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] What a letdown! The suitcase is empty![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
You make a grand eccentric entrance into a vault.

 You can make out a crate.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The crate contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a spare room. An ordinary kind of place.

 If you haven't noticed it already, there seems to be something there by the wall, it's a shelf. The shelf is usual.[if there is something on the s_2] On the shelf you see [a list of things on the s_2]. Hmmm... what else, what else?[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash.[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: garage
infos.desc:
You arrive in a garage. An ordinary one. You can barely contain your excitement.

 You make out a Microsoft chest.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The Microsoft chest contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The Microsoft chest is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You are in a shower. A normal kind of place.

 You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a bench. [if there is something on the s_3]On the bench you make out [a list of things on the s_3]. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this![end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash.[end if] You can make out a board. [if there is something on the s_4]On the board you see [a list of things on the s_4]. Hmmm... what else, what else?[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]However, the board, like an empty board, has nothing on it. You move on, clearly upset with TextWorld.[end if] You make out a counter. [if there is something on the s_5]You see [a list of things on the s_5] on the counter.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: sauna
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a sauna. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: salon
infos.desc:
You arrive in a salon. A typical kind of place.



There is an unblocked exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: attic
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in an attic.

 You make out a toolbox. Suddenly, you bump your head on the ceiling, but it's not such a bad bump that it's going to prevent you from looking at objects and even things.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The toolbox contains [a list of things in the c_7]. You look around you, at all the containers and supporters, doors and objects, and you think to yourself. Why? Why Textworld?[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] The toolbox is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: cellar
infos.desc:
Well how about that, you are in a place we're calling a cellar. You begin looking for stuff.



There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the south.

infos.name: bar
infos.desc:
Ah, the bar. This is some kind of bar, really great usual vibes in this place, a wonderful usual atmosphere. You can barely contain your excitement.

 You make out a mantle. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best? The mantle is usual.[if there is something on the s_6] On the mantle you make out [a list of things on the s_6].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6] But there isn't a thing on it. You make a mental note to not get your hopes up the next time you see a mantle in a room.[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a workshop.

 You make out an armchair. [if there is something on the s_7]On the armchair you can make out [a list of things on the s_7].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You have walked into a study. Not the study you'd expect. No, this is a study. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.

 You can see a type 5 chest. There's something strange about this thing being here, but you don't have time to worry about that now.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The type 5 chest contains [a list of things in the c_8].[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] What a letdown! The type 5 chest is empty![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
You are in a bedchamber. A standard one.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: portal
infos.desc: it is what it is, a portal [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: cabinet
infos.desc: The cabinet looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: type 0 safe
infos.desc: The type 0 safe looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: rectangular safe
infos.desc: The rectangular safe looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: chest
infos.desc: The chest looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: suitcase
infos.desc: The suitcase looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: crate
infos.desc: The crate looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.desc: The Microsoft chest looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.desc: The toolbox looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.desc: The type 5 chest looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: stick of butter
infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that ordinary thing.

infos.name: cookie
infos.desc: that's a normal cookie!

infos.name: burger
infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that normal thing.

infos.name: type 5 passkey
infos.desc: The type 5 passkey is light.

infos.name: synthesizer
infos.desc: The synthesizer is well-used.

infos.name: cushion
infos.desc: The cushion is well-used.

infos.name: bug
infos.desc: The bug would seem to be well matched to everything else here

infos.name: fly larva
infos.desc: The fly larva appears to be out of place here

infos.name: table
infos.desc: The table is an unstable piece of garbage.

infos.name: bookshelf
infos.desc: The bookshelf is reliable.

infos.name: shelf
infos.desc: The shelf is an unstable piece of trash.

infos.name: bench
infos.desc: The bench is reliable.

infos.name: board
infos.desc: The board is stable.

infos.name: counter
infos.desc: The counter is solid.

infos.name: mantle
infos.desc: The mantle is unstable.

infos.name: armchair
infos.desc: The armchair is unstable.

infos.name: loaf of bread
infos.desc: The loaf of bread looks delectable.

infos.name: sandwich
infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that ordinary thing.

infos.name: legume
infos.desc: that's a standard legume!

infos.name: durian
infos.desc: that's an ordinary durian!

infos.name: melon
infos.desc: The melon looks appealing.

infos.name: carrot
infos.desc: that's a normal carrot!

infos.name: gummy bear
infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that standard thing.

infos.name: type 0 latchkey
infos.desc: The type 0 latchkey is surprisingly heavy.

infos.name: rectangular passkey
infos.desc: The rectangular passkey is weighty.

infos.name: key
infos.desc: The key is cold to the touch

infos.name: Microsoft latchkey
infos.desc: The metal of the Microsoft latchkey is rusty.

infos.name: insect
infos.desc: The insect appears to be to fit in here

infos.name: controller
infos.desc: The controller is cheap looking.

infos.desc: The textbook looks to fit in here

infos.desc: The manuscript is dirty.

objective: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an profound round of TextWorld? You do! Here is your task for today. First, it would be good if you could head west. With that over with, go to the south. And then, take a trip west. Following that, try to go north. After that, move north. With that done, attempt to travel east. With that accomplished, go to the east. With that over with, head east. With that accomplished, make an attempt to head south. After that, doublecheck that the cabinet is closed. And if you do that, you're the winner!
